EmailTemplate.name: Evidence Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Evidence Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c}
Corrective evidence
Don’t forget, you must submit your corrective actions and evidence by {!Application__c.Evidence_Deadline__c}
This is an automated reminder, so if you have already submitted the evidence and pink report you can ignore this email.
Please email all supporting evidence including the pink report left by the assessor. Once done please send to help@rspcaassured.org.uk on a separate email quoting your membership number and farm name. Please note that the pink report needs to include your corrections to the non-compliances raised with a signature and date to show rectification of this 
If we do not receive your corrective actions and evidence on time your membership maybe suspended and you may have to reapply.
If you need any help please get in touch with our Membership Services team on 01403 286170 or help@rspcaassured.org.uk.

Yours sincerely Membership services RSPCA Assured For your reference: RSPCA welfare standards RSPCA Assured renewing your membership fact sheet RSPCA Assured membership agreement (including SCI scheme regulations)
